channel.title: Need Some Help
channel.description:
Okay i don't know what to do but this is what i've done so far.. i've downladed the ' Moparscape30 ' zipfile, unzipped it...
This is what it looks like. ----------- [IMG]http://i5.photobucket.com/albums/y170/ozzey9/1.jpg[/img] -----------
Ok! i dubble click on the ' Moparscape30 ' Folder and it brings up some folders like ' all_IDs, Aryan, HybirdScape, lib, Music, MoparScape, runMoparScape, runMoparScape-linux.sh '
---------- [IMG]http://i5.photobucket.com/albums/y170/ozzey9/2.jpg[/img] ----------
I was reading a tut and it says click on the ' runMoparScape ' but when i click on that it comes up with a black box and it says inside it.
" 'java' is not recognized as in internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . . "
---------- [IMG]http://i5.photobucket.com/albums/y170/ozzey9/3.jpg[/img] ----------
Okay, so i wonder if anybody could help me get this working i would be very happy i'm sorry if you dont understand what i've done but i've tryed to make is as clear as possable.. Thanks alot
~Ozzey2k5
PS. i also clicked on the, MoparScape Executeable Jar File 353 KB
And it said " Failed to load Main-Class manifest attribure from C:\Documents And Settings\Graham\My Documents\Aaron\Moparscape30\Moparscape30\Moparscape.jar
Thanks Again!!

item.title: Need Some Help
item.dc:creator: @Run_From_Aut Run From Aut
item.description:
@Run_From_Aut wrote:

Extrace that folder somewhere else. Then run it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Some Help
item.dc:creator: @ozzey2k5 ozzey2k5
item.description:
@ozzey2k5 wrote:

Okay i don’t know what to do but this is what i’ve done so far…
i’ve downladed the ’ Moparscape30 ’ zipfile, unzipped it…

This is what it looks like.

1.jpg1024×768

Ok! i dubble click on the ’ Moparscape30 ’ Folder and it brings up some folders like ’ all_IDs, Aryan, HybirdScape, lib, Music, MoparScape, runMoparScape, runMoparScape-linux.sh ’

2.jpg1024×768

I was reading a tut and it says click on the ’ runMoparScape ’ but when i click on that it comes up with a black box and it says inside it.

" ‘java’ is not recognized as in internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . . "

3.jpg1024×768

Okay, so i wonder if anybody could help me get this working i would be very happy i’m sorry if you dont understand what i’ve done but i’ve tryed to make is as clear as possable… Thanks alot

~Ozzey2k5

PS. i also clicked on the,
MoparScape
Executeable Jar File
353 KB

And it said " Failed to load Main-Class manifest attribure from
C:\Documents And Settings\Graham\My Documents\Aaron\Moparscape30\Moparscape30\Moparscape.jar

Thanks Again!!
